text: The tribe of Levi alone you shall not enroll nor include in the census along with the other Israelites.
All the guests of Adonijah got up trembling, and went each their way,
When Shaul died, Baalhanan, son of Achbor, succeeded him as king.
so that they might forget the law and change all its ordinances.
The Mighty One has done great things for me, and holy is his name.
Nathanael answered him, “Rabbi, you are the Son of God; you are the King of Israel.”
